titleInfo.title: Karl Zerbe and Adolf Karl with Representative of Tallahassee Art League

mods.abstract: Professor Karl Zerbe stands with Associate Professor Adolf Karl with a representative of the Tallahassee Art League in a museum. Professor Zerbe is holding a portrait of an unknown man.
mods.accessCondition: Use of this item is provided for non-commercial, personal, educational, and research use only. For information about the copyright and reproduction rights for this item, please contact Special Collections, Florida State University Libraries, Tallahassee, Florida.
